document_data.name: Rags Deelarma
document_data.mainbody:
'''Rags Deelarma''' was a begger and a refugee from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|Piss off, tight-arse!|Rags Deelarma}}
document_data.Description: Deelarma was a [[human]] woman with a light skin tone and blue eyes. She kept her brown hair cut short.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, an army assembled by the [[Cult of the Absolute]] moved from the [[Moonrise Towers]] in the [[Chionthar Valley]] to menace the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], displacing countless refugees in the process along the way. Rags Deelarma was one of the refugees forced from her home. She found shelter in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate at [[Nortale's Hostel]]. To survive, she begged for coin in front of the [[Counting House]].
